brandPresence.name: Brand Presence
brandPresence.description: Measures how well your brand appears in AI-generated responses
insights: Brand mentioned in 78% of relevant AI queries
Strong presence in ChatGPT and Perplexity

issues.title: Low Gemini visibility
issues.description: Brand appears in only 45% of Gemini responses for target keywords

recommendations: Optimize content for Google's Knowledge Graph integration
Increase structured data markup across key pages
Build authoritative backlinks from Gemini-indexed sources

contentQuality.name: Content Quality
contentQuality.description: Evaluates content depth, accuracy, and AI-friendliness
insights: Content depth scores above industry average
Strong factual accuracy across product pages

issues.title: Thin content on blog posts
issues.description: 15 blog posts under 800 words lack depth for AI indexing
issues.impact: Reduced likelihood of citation in AI responses

recommendations: Expand thin content pieces to 1500+ words
Add data-backed claims with proper citations
Include FAQ sections for common queries

eeat.name: E-E-A-T Score
eeat.description: Experience, Expertise, Authoritativeness, and Trustworthiness signals
insights: Excellent trust signals (SSL, privacy policy, contact info)

issues.title: Missing author bios on 8 articles
issues.description: Some content lacks clear authorship attribution
issues.impact: Reduced trust signals for AI models

recommendations: Add comprehensive author bios to all content
Showcase team credentials on about page
Obtain industry certifications and display them prominently

semanticRelevance.name: Semantic Relevance
semanticRelevance.description: How well content aligns with user intent and semantic search
insights: Strong topical authority in core areas

issues.title: Weak coverage of related entities
issues.description: Missing connections to 12 related industry entities
issues.impact: Lower relevance scores in AI semantic understanding

issues.title: Intent mismatch on product pages
issues.description: 3 product pages optimized for wrong search intent

recommendations: Build content clusters around related entities
Realign product page content with transactional intent
Implement schema markup for entity relationships

competitivePosition.name: Competitive Position
competitivePosition.description: Your standing vs competitors in AI search results
insights: Ranked #3 in AI mentions for primary keywords

issues.title: Competitor dominance in AI citations
issues.impact: Losing significant market share in AI-driven discovery

issues.title: Weak comparison content
issues.description: Lack of comparison pages for key competitor matchups
issues.impact: Missing opportunities for direct comparison queries

recommendations: Create comprehensive comparison content
Build strategic partnerships for co-citations
Increase PR efforts to boost authoritative mentions

technicalSeo.name: Technical SEO
technicalSeo.description: Technical foundation for AI crawler accessibility
insights: Excellent site speed (Core Web Vitals passed)

issues.title: Minor mobile usability issues
issues.description: 2 pages have touch target sizing issues

recommendations: Fix mobile usability issues on identified pages
Implement breadcrumb schema on all pages
Add FAQ schema to support pages

aiReadiness.name: AI Readiness
aiReadiness.description: Overall preparedness for AI-first search era
insights: Strong API documentation for potential integrations

issues.title: Missing conversational content
issues.description: Limited Q&A format content for voice/chat interfaces
issues.impact: Reduced visibility in conversational AI responses

issues.title: No AI-specific optimization
issues.description: Content not optimized for AI model training data preferences
issues.impact: Lower priority in AI model knowledge bases

recommendations: Create FAQ pages in conversational format
Optimize content for featured snippet capture
Implement JSON-LD for all key content types
Build comprehensive knowledge base with clear hierarchies
